PmogUser

This class stores all the attributes needed by the player during the normal course of play.

Summary
PmogUser
This class stores all the attributes needed by the player during the normal course of play.
Functions
PmogUser
Initializes the Object
Variables
The user is logged in
For example, ‘Destroyer’, ‘Shoat’ etc.
For example, ‘Destroyer’, ‘Shoat’ etc.
For example, ‘Destroyer’, ‘Shoat’ etc.
Pmog username
Player’s level
Player’s next level
Containing simple hashes of player attributes
String Text used for a tooltip to explain to the user what tasks they must complete to reach the next level.
Functions
update
This method updates the player with any properties provided by the obj parameter
has_at_least_one
This method determines if the user has at least one item in their inventory that matches the name of the tool passed in as the parameter.
is_playing
Check the preferences to determine if the user is playing.

Functions

update

PmogUser.prototype.update = function(obj)

This method updates the player with any properties provided by the obj parameter

Parameters

objAn object of attributes to assign to the player.

has_at_least_one

PmogUser.prototype.has_at_least_one = function(tool)

This method determines if the user has at least one item in their inventory that matches the name of the tool passed in as the parameter.

Parameters

toolString of the name of the tool to search the inventory for.

Returns

true or false

is_playing

PmogUser.prototype.is_playing = function()

Check the preferences to determine if the user is playing.

Returns

returns true or false
